mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia Law Review Board 1925-1926
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Including members of the Class of 1926, Class of 1927, Class of 1928 and Class of 1929. Allen M. Beard, Walter L. Brown, Charles G. Buck, John D. Carr, Lewis C. Carroll, LeRoy R. Cohen, Jr., Paul H. Coleman, Edwin H. Copenhaver, John T. Delaney, Allyn Dillard, Hardy C. Dillard, (Class of 1927, fourth Dean of the School of Law [1963-1968] - first row, third from left), Mansfield C. Fuldner, Claude L. Gray, Robert C. Grove, Richard W. Hagan, Jr., Robert L. Hinds, Edwin R. Holmes, Jr., Albert S. Kemper, Richard S. Leftwich, J. M. B. Lewis, Jr., James B. Lovelace, John P. McGuire, Jr., H. Maxwell Parker, Nathan S. Poffenbarger, William S. Potter, John Ritchie, III, Adolphus B. Scott, Kingham C. Shelburne, Charles H. Smith, McLane Tilton, III, R. Harrel Whilden.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
